Read IOHK’s latest blog about Marlowe, a domain-specific language (DSL) for financial contracts. Using a DSL has many advantages, such as it being usable by someone who is expert in a particular field, rather than requiring programming skills. Read on here  https://t.co/uKKGlXXOgs
